duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor and manage various tasks and projects with strong critical thinking and discretion.
Edit and create documents using advanced technical skills in Microsoft Word and PowerPoint.
Review documents for quality control before final production/distribution.
Complete monthly client invoicing and project budget management.
Handle sensitive information with professionalism and integrity.
Promote smooth workflow and ensure team needs are met.
Frequent interaction with senior level leadership.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience.
